summary.text: ADDR defines the Bech32 prefix of an account address
ADDR_VAL defines the Bech32 prefix of an validator's operator address
ADDR_VALCONS defines the Bech32 prefix of a consensus node address
PUB defines the Bech32 prefix of an account's public key
PUB_VAL defines the Bech32 prefix of an validator's operator public key
PUB_VALCONS defines the Bech32 prefix of a consensus node public key

The 'Sdk' object is the main entrypoint to the Nibiru TypeScript SDK.
It can be used to interact with the Nibiru blockchain from Node or browser
environments.
Creates an instance of Sdk.
TxCmd is analagous to the 'nibid tx' command of the nibid CLI.

Simulates a transaction containing the given list of tx messages, 'msgs' and
returns an estimate of how many gas units are required.

Specifies chain information for all endpoints a node exposes such as the
gRPC server, Tendermint RPC endpoint, and REST server.
chainId: identifier for the chain
endptGrpc: endpoint for the gRPC gateway. Usually on port 9090.
endptRest: endpoint for the REST server. Also, the LCD endpoint.
endptTm: endpoint for the Tendermint RPC server. Usually on port 26657.

markets - Return the pair identifier, oracle set, and active status for
each trading pair.
oracles - Return the list of oracle addresses for a given trading pair.
params - Show the parameters of the 'pricefeed' module
price - Return the current price for the given pair
prices - Return the current price for all pairs

pricesRaw - Return the raw prices posted by each oracle for a pair.
These prices are have yet to be aggregated into a single representative
value for the pair.

Chaosnet is a private chain with trading bots, an oracle, and a node
running an updated version of Nibiru. This environment is useful for live
testing.
Generates a new wallet with a BIP39 mnemonic of length 24.

content.text: A wallet for protobuf based signing using SIGN_MODE_DIRECT.

summary.text: (optional) The number of words in the mnemonic (12, 15, 18, 21 or 24).
(optional) Bech32 address prefix. Defaults to "nibi".

Assembles an all-purpose SDK for interacting with the Nibiru blockchain.

If transaction signing is not needed, simply pass an empty string for the
mnemonic. The querier and Tendermint client will still function normally.
Creates a wallet from the given BIP39 mnemonic.

content.text: A wallet for protobuf based signing using SIGN_MODE_DIRECT

summary.text: (optional) Bech32 address prefix. Defaults to "nibi".

toSdkDec converts the input float string to an sdk.Dec.
The maximum number of decimal places for an sdk.Dec is 18.
NOTE: An error is thrown if more decimal digits are provided than the
precision, 18.

ref: Reimplementation of cosmos-sdk/types/decimal.go
Sends 10 NIBI and 100 NUSD to the given address from the testnet faucet.
